translation.en: [boy] Dear Evan Hansen...
Today is going to be an amazing day, and here's why.
translation.zh: 今天将是美好的一天… 原因如下

translation.en: Because today, all you have to do is just be yourself.
translation.zh: 因为今天 你只要做自己就行

translation.en: But also confident. That's important.
translation.zh: 但要自信 这点很重要

translation.en: And interesting, easy to talk to, approachable,
translation.zh: 还要幽默、好说话、平易近人

translation.en: but mostly just be yourself.
That's number one. Be yourself.
translation.zh: 这一点最重要 做自己

translation.en: But, like, a confident version of yourself,
like, approachable and interesting,
translation.zh: 亲切又幽默 而不是奇怪、焦虑又压抑

translation.en: not weird or anxious or depressed, which you're not.
translation.zh: 而不是奇怪、焦虑又压抑 但这些都不是你 我都不知道你为何这么说

translation.en: I don't know why you're bringing it up.
translation.zh: 我都不知道你为何这么说 你不能害怕跟别人说话

translation.en: You can't be scared to talk to other people.
translation.zh: 你不能害怕跟别人说话 你说过你会变得更好 今年会不一样

translation.en: This year'd be different.
translation.zh: 你说过你会变得更好 今年会不一样

translation.en: You're overthinking it. Do you like having no friends?
translation.zh: 你想太多了 你喜欢没有朋友吗？

translation.en: All you have to do is just be yourself.
♪ I've learned to slam on the brake ♪
♪ Before I even turn the key ♪
♪ Before I make the mistake ♪
♪ Before I lead with the worst of me ♪
translation.zh: 趁没用我最差的一面开场

translation.en: ♪ Give them no reason to stare ♪
♪ No slippin' up if you slip away ♪
♪ So I got nothing to share ♪
♪ No, I got nothing to say ♪
♪ Step out Step out of the sun ♪
translation.zh: 躲开 躲到阳光之外

translation.en: ♪ If you keep getting burned ♪
♪ Step out Step out of the sun ♪ ♪ Because you've learned ♪
translation.zh: 退后 退去阴影之后 因为你已明白

translation.en: ♪ Because you've learned ♪
♪ On the outside Always lookin' in ♪
♪ Will I ever be more than I've always been? ♪
translation.zh: 我的一成不变会不会有所突破？

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause I'm tap, tap, tapping On the glass ♪
♪ I'm waving through a window ♪
♪ I try to speak But nobody can hear ♪
translation.zh: 我努力开口 却没有听众

translation.en: ♪ So I wait around for An answer to appear ♪
translation.zh: 于是我四处环顾 等待答案出现

translation.en: ♪ While I'm watch, watch Watchin' people pass ♪
translation.zh: 我看着人们从我眼前经过

translation.en: ♪ I'm waving through a window ♪
♪ Can anybody see? Is anybody waving back at me? ♪
translation.zh: 有人看到我吗？ 有人向我挥手回应吗？

translation.en: So you just didn't eat last night?
-I wasn't hungry. -You're a senior in high school.
translation.zh: 我昨晚不饿 你已经上高三了

translation.en: You need to be able to order dinner for yourself.
You can do it all online. You don't have to talk to anybody.
translation.zh: 你可以在网上点 不需要和任何人说话

translation.en: Okay, well, that's not true, actually. Because the credit card's expired,
translation.zh: 但事实并非如此 因为信用卡过期了

translation.en: so you have to meet the delivery person at the door, you know?
translation.zh: 所以得跟门口的 外卖员打交道 知道吗？

translation.en: You have to pay cash at the door. You have to greet them.
translation.zh: 得在门口付他们现金 跟他们打招呼

translation.en: You have to figure out the right-- The proper greeting.
translation.zh: 还得想好合适的… 合适的打招呼方式

translation.en: Okay.
This is what you're supposed to be working on, sweetheart, with Dr. Sherman.
translation.zh: 这就是你该和谢尔曼医生 一起努力的事情 亲爱的

translation.en: Have you been doing those letters he wants you to do?
"Dear Evan Hansen."
Yeah, I've definitely-- I've been trying to.
Those letters are important, honey. You have to keep working.
translation.zh: 那些信很重要 亲爱的 你得继续写

translation.en: We can't go back to where you were last year, right?
translation.zh: 你不能回到去年那样 对吧？

translation.en: You have an appointment this afternoon.
translation.zh: 你今天下去有预约 我六点下班

translation.en: I'm working till 6:00, so you're gonna have to take the bus.
translation.zh: 你今天下去有预约 我六点下班 所以你得坐公交车了

translation.en: Hey.
I thought you could go around and ask all the other kids to sign your cast.
translation.zh: 你觉得你可以 请其他学生在你的石膏上签名

translation.en: Perfect icebreaker, right?
translation.zh: 完美的破冰话题 对吗？

translation.en: -What happened to your shirt? -There was a stain on it.
-But it's brand-new! -Yes, I know.
translation.zh: 它是全新的 我知道

translation.en: I was-- I'm so mad.
♪ We start with stars in our eyes ♪
translation.zh: 我们一开始时眼中群星闪烁

translation.en: ♪ We start believing that we belong ♪
♪ But every sun doesn't rise ♪
♪ And no one tells you Where you went wrong ♪
translation.zh: 没人告诉你是哪一步走错

translation.en: ♪ Step out Step out of the sun ♪
translation.zh: 躲开 躲到阳光之外

translation.en: ♪ If you keep getting burned ♪
♪ Step out Step out of the sun ♪ ♪ Because you've learned ♪

translation.en: ♪ Because you've learned ♪
♪ On the outside Always lookin' in ♪
♪ Will I ever be more than I've always been? ♪

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause I'm tap, tap, tapping On the glass ♪
♪ Waving through a window ♪
♪ I try to speak But nobody can hear ♪

translation.en: ♪ So I wait around for An answer to appear ♪

translation.en: ♪ While I'm watch, watch Watchin' people pass ♪
translation.zh: 我看着人们从我眼前经过

♪ Can anybody see? ♪
♪ Is anybody waving? ♪
♪ When you're fallin' in a forest And there's nobody around ♪

translation.en: ♪ Do you ever really crash Or even make a sound? ♪
translation.zh: 你是轰然倒地 还是默默无声？

translation.en: ♪ When you're fallin' in a forest And there's nobody around ♪
translation.zh: 当你在森林里跌落 周围空无一人

translation.en: ♪ Do you ever really crash Or even make a sound? ♪
translation.zh: 你是轰然倒地 还是默默无声？

translation.zh: 当你在森林里跌落 周围空无一人

translation.en: ♪ Do you ever really crash Or even make a sound? ♪
translation.zh: 你是轰然倒地 还是默默无声？

translation.en: ♪ When you're fallin' in a forest And there's nobody around ♪
translation.zh: 当你在森林里跌落 周围空无一人

translation.en: ♪ Do you ever really crash Or even make a sound? ♪
translation.zh: 你是轰然倒地 还是默默无声？

translation.en: ♪ Did I even make a sound? Did I even make a sound? ♪
♪ It's like I never made a sound ♪
♪ Will I ever make a sound? ♪
♪ On the outside Always lookin' in ♪
♪ Will I ever be more than I've always been? ♪

♪ Waving through a window ♪
♪ I try to speak But nobody can hear ♪

translation.en: ♪ Waving through a window ♪
♪ Can anybody see? ♪
♪ Is anybody waving back at me? ♪
♪ Is anybody waving? ♪
♪ Waving, waving ♪
[boy] Evan.
What?
It's Zoe Murphy in that hot band shirt you love so much.
translation.zh: 佐伊墨菲穿着你最爱的乐队T恤

translation.en: Can you just-- Can you please stop?
Well, hey, maybe she's into you too.
translation.zh: 嘿 她也许也喜欢你

translation.en: Maybe you should talk to her, tell her how you feel.
translation.zh: 你应该跟她谈谈 告诉她你的感觉

translation.en: I've tried talking to her.
Really?
Yes-- Yeah, I--
I stayed afterwards last year, after the spring jazz band concert,
translation.zh: 去年爵士乐队音乐会结束后 我留了下来

translation.en: but, um, I didn't go up to her because I was worried that my hands were sweaty.
translation.zh: 但是我没去找她 因为我担心手上有汗

translation.en: Which they weren't even that sweaty. I just--
translation.zh: 其实手上也没那么多汗 我只是…我担心我的手上有汗

translation.en: I was worried they were sweaty and worrying makes them sweaty.
translation.zh: 我只是…我担心我的手上有汗 因为太担心手上有汗 导致出更多汗

translation.en: So I just went to the bathroom and I put 'em under the hand dryer thing,
translation.zh: 所以我就去卫生间 把手放在了烘干机下面

translation.en: but then they were still sweaty. They were just-- They were just also warm.
translation.zh: 但烘干之后还是有汗 而且它们还热热的

translation.en: I was kidding.
You obviously should not talk to her. You are a literal disaster.
translation.zh: 你显然不该跟她说话 你真的无可救药了

translation.en: Go, Bobcats!
Go, Bobcats.
So awesome. So awesome, everyone. Phenomenal, really.
translation.zh: 太棒了 大家都太棒了 真的太惊人了

translation.en: You know what's not phenomenal? Deforestation.
translation.zh: 你们知道什么不算惊人吗？ 森林砍伐

translation.en: -[laughter] -So, what happened to your arm, exactly?
translation.zh: 所以你的胳膊到底怎么了？

translation.en: I was climbing a tree and I fell. It was stupid.
translation.zh: 我爬树的时候摔下来了 很蠢的

translation.en: You fell out of a tree? What are you, five?
translation.zh: 你从树上摔下来了？ 你是五岁小孩吗？

translation.en: Well, um…
So, actually, I worked this summer
as an apprentice park ranger at Ellison State Park.
translation.zh: 我在埃里森州立公园 做实习公园管理员

translation.en: It's a funny story though, because…
there was ten minutes, after I fell,
translation.zh: 因为我摔下来后的十分钟

translation.en: where I just lay there on the ground, waiting for someone to come get me.
translation.zh: 躺在原地… 等着人来扶我

translation.en: I was like, "Any second now." You know?
I was saying to myself, "Any second now. Here they come." So…
translation.zh: 我对自己说：“他们随时会来”

translation.en: Did they?
No. Nobody came. That's the, um-- That's what's funny.
translation.zh: 没有 没人来 这就是…这就是好笑的地方

translation.en: That's not funny.
Model UN.
Well, anyways, um… How was-- Did you… How was camp?
translation.zh: 算了 怎么…你… 集训怎么样？

translation.en: Well, I put on 13 pounds of pure muscle.
translation.zh: 我增加了约六公斤的肌肉

translation.en: Also, I hooked up with this Brazilian dude who is literally a supermodel.
translation.zh: 而且我还勾搭上了 一个有着超模身材的巴西哥们

translation.en: So, yeah, hope that answers your question.
translation.zh: 希望这能回答你的问题

translation.en: So let's have Mother Nature's back so that she'll have ours.
translation.zh: 所以让大自然母亲回归 让她来庇护我们吧

translation.en: Yeah!
All right, thank you, Alana. Very inspirational.
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢 阿兰娜 非常鼓舞人心

translation.en: All right, so, let's have a great year, and… Go, Bobcats!
translation.zh: 好了 祝大家有美好的一年 加油 山猫

translation.en: Hey, um…
would you wanna sign my cast?
translation.zh: 你愿意在我的石膏上签名吗？

translation.en: You could-- You could be the first.
Why would I do that?
Well, I just-- I thought because we're friends, and…
translation.zh: 我只是…我觉得… 因为我们是朋友 而且…

translation.en: We're family friends, Evan. That's an entirely different thing.
translation.zh: 我们是家庭型朋友 埃文 这是完全不同的概念

translation.en: Please respect that.
Connor, I'm loving this manicure. It's very school shooter chic.
translation.zh: 康纳 我很你喜欢你的美甲 很有校园枪击者的风格

translation.en: -You're such an idiot. -That is so not a joke.
You think that's funny?
What? No. Not at all.
translation.zh: 什么？没有 一点也不好笑

translation.en: [shouting] Then stop laughing!
[Zoe] Hey.
I'm sorry about my brother. He's a psycho.
translation.zh: 我为我哥哥向你道歉 他是个神经病

translation.en: Evan, right?
Evan…
That's your-- That's your name.
Yeah, it is. It is. Sorry. It's Evan.
translation.zh: 是的 没错 抱歉 我叫埃文 对不起

translation.en: It's Evan. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我叫埃文 对不起

translation.en: Why are you sorry?
'Cause you said Evan, and then I said it, you know?
translation.zh: 因为你说过了埃文 我又说了一遍

translation.en: I just repeated it, which is, um…
translation.zh: 我重复了你的话 这…

translation.en: That's just really annoying when people do that, so…
I'm Zoe.
It's a-- I should-- I think-- Sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起 我应该…我觉得…对不起

translation.en: [Evan] Dear Evan Hansen,
Turns out this wasn't an amazing day after all.
translation.zh: 事实证明 今天一点都不美好

translation.en: This isn't gonna be an amazing week or an amazing year,
translation.zh: 接下来的一周或一年都将不再美好

translation.en: because why would it be?
translation.zh: 因为有什么理由美好呢？

translation.en: Oh, I know. Because there's Zoe.
translation.zh: 我知道了 因为有佐伊

translation.en: Who I don't even know, and who doesn't know me, but…
translation.zh: 一个和我互不相识的人 但是…

translation.en: maybe if I did, maybe if I could just talk to her.
translation.zh: 如果我认识她 如果我能跟她说上话

translation.en: Maybe things would be better.
Or…
maybe nothing would be different at all.
translation.zh: 也许根本就不会有任何不同 （多样性是我们的共性）

translation.en: I wish everything was different.
translation.zh: 真希望一切都有所不同

translation.en: I wish I was different.
I wish I was part of something.
I wish that anything I said mattered to anyone.
translation.zh: 真希望有人把我的话放在心上

translation.en: But it doesn't, and it never did…
translation.zh: 但是事实并非如此 从来都不是如此

translation.en: and it never will.
I mean, face it, would anyone even notice if I just disappeared tomorrow?
translation.zh: 我是说… 直说吧 如果我明天消失了 有人会注意到吗？

translation.en: Sincerely, your best and most dearest friend, me.
translation.zh: 谨启 你最好最亲爱的朋友… 我

translation.en: Hey. What happened to your arm?
translation.zh: 嘿 你的胳膊怎么了？

translation.en: I was climbing a tree and I fell.
translation.zh: 我爬树的时候摔下来了

translation.en: You fell out of a tree?
That's the saddest thing I've ever heard.
translation.zh: 这是我听过最可悲的事

translation.en: I know.
So-- Sorry, um, I think I accidentally printed something.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我好像不小心 打印了什么东西

translation.en: Yeah, we're all waiting.
translation.zh: 好的 我们都等着呢

translation.en: Um, no one signed your cast.
translation.zh: 没人在你的石膏上签名

translation.en: -No, I know. -I'll sign it.
translation.zh: 对 我知道 我来签一个

translation.en: -You don't-- You really don't have to-- -Do you have a Sharpie or…
translation.zh: 你真的没必要… 你有三福笔吗？

translation.en: I don't. Shoot.
Here's one.
Nice.
Wow, that's great.
Now we can both pretend we have friends.
translation.zh: 现在咱俩都可以假装自己有朋友了

translation.en: -"Dear Evan Hansen." Here you go. -Yeah, that's mine.
translation.zh: “致埃文汉森” 给你 那是我的 给我吧 抱歉

translation.en: That's mine. I can take it. Sorry.
translation.zh: 那是我的 给我吧 抱歉

translation.en: "Because there's Zoe"…
Is this about my sister?
What? No, no. Who's-- Who's your sister?
-You wanted me to find this? -What?
You saw I was here, so you started writing this,
translation.zh: 你看见我在这里 就开始写这些话 然后跟我说话

translation.en: -and you started talking to me. -No, you started talking to me.
translation.zh: 就开始写这些话 然后跟我说话 是你先跟我说的

translation.en: So that I would read some creepy shit about my sister and freak out, right?
translation.zh: 这样我就能看到 有关我妹妹的恐怖文字 然后发疯 对吗？

translation.en: -Why would I do that? -So you can tell everyone that I'm crazy.
translation.zh: -我为什么要这么做？-这样你就能到处说我疯了

translation.en: Right? Right?
translation.zh: -我为什么要这么做？-这样你就能到处说我疯了 -对吗？-两位

translation.en: Gentlemen! Shh.
No, I really--
Look, I really need that back.
So-- Look, can you please just give it back?
Just please don't show it to anyone.
Connor!
Come on.
Shit. Shit.
-Hi. -Hi, honey, I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: -嗨-嗨 亲爱的 真的很抱歉

translation.en: Erica called in at the last minute with a stomach bug,
translation.zh: 艾丽卡刚打电话说她胃不舒服

translation.en: and there's only one other nurse on tonight.
translation.zh: 而且今天晚上只有一个护士值班

translation.en: So I volunteered to take her shift.
translation.zh: 所以我就主动接了她的班

translation.en: I hope you weren't waiting for me to eat.
-No, I already ate. -Um, it's just,
translation.zh: 没事 我已经吃过了 今天早上他们说要削减预算

translation.en: they announced more budget cuts this morning,
translation.zh: 今天早上他们说要削减预算

translation.en: so anything I can do to show that I'm a team player, you know?
translation.zh: 所以我得证明自己 有团队精神 懂吗？

translation.en: -How was your day? -Fine.
It was-- It was pretty good.
Yeah? You know, I texted with Meera this morning,
translation.zh: 是吗？我今天早上给米拉发过消息了

translation.en: and she said Jared was really looking forward to
translation.zh: 她说杰瑞德很期待见到你

translation.en: seeing you and reconnecting.
I thought that was nice.
Yeah, he's so nice.
-How was Dr. Sherman? -Pretty good.
Any change to your meds?
Um, no.
Oh, God. Here he comes. All right, I--
translation.zh: 天啊 他来了 好了

translation.en: All right, love you. Bye.
translation.zh: 就这样 我爱你 再见

translation.en: -Okay, I love you… -[line beeping]
...too.
[Jared] A letter to yourself.
What is that, like some kind of sex thing?
No. No, it's not a sex thing.
-It was an assignment from my therapist. -Ew.
translation.zh: 那是我的心理医生布置的任务

translation.en: Why are you telling me this?
I didn't know who to tell.
You're my only… family friend.
translation.zh: 你是我唯一的家庭型朋友

translation.en: That's sad.
Look, Connor isn't here again today. That's three days in a row.
translation.zh: 听着 康纳今天又没来 已经连续三天了

translation.en: He hasn't done anything with it yet, put it online or whatever.
translation.zh: 他对它没有任何动作 比如放在网上

translation.en: Because I've… I've been checking.
So, you know, maybe he just-- Maybe he forgot, right?
translation.zh: 所以或许他只是… 或者他忘了 对吗？

translation.en: Right. Right.
Or maybe he didn't, because he's definitely gonna put it online.
translation.zh: 或者也许他没忘 因为他一定会把它放在网上的

translation.en: Dude, Connor Murphy is batshit.
translation.zh: 兄弟 康纳墨菲是个疯子

translation.en: Remember when he threw a printer at Mrs. G in the second grade
translation.zh: 你不记得他二年级时 把打印机扔向G老师

translation.en: because he couldn't be line leader?
translation.zh: 就因为他当不成领队吗？

translation.en: He was seven.
Just imagine what he's capable of now.
translation.zh: 想象一下他现在能做出什么事来

translation.en: [woman on PA] Evan Hansen, report to Mr. Howard's office.
translation.zh: 埃文汉森请到霍华德老师办公室报到

translation.en: Oh, damn.
Evan.
Connor Murphy's mother and stepfather are here to see you.
translation.zh: 康纳墨菲的妈妈和继父要见你

translation.en: They want to speak in private.
Hi.
Hello.
Why don't you go ahead, honey?
translation.zh: 还是你说吧 亲爱的

translation.en: I'm going as fast as I can.
translation.zh: 我已经尽量抓紧时间了

translation.en: Well, that's not what I said, is it?
translation.zh: 我不是那个意思 对吗？

translation.en: This is--
Connor wanted you to have this.
[man] We didn't know you were friends.
translation.zh: 我们都不知道你们是朋友

translation.en: Well, we didn't think Connor had any friends, frankly.
translation.zh: 我们没想过康纳会有朋友 坦白说

translation.en: And then we see this note, and it seems to suggest pretty clearly
translation.zh: 直到我们看到这封遗书 它清楚地表明

translation.en: that you and Connor were… or at least, for Connor--
translation.zh: 你和康纳是… 起码对康纳来说是…

translation.en: "Dear Evan Hansen."
He addressed it to you. He wrote it to you.
translation.zh: 那是他对你说的话 他写给了你

translation.en: These are the words that he wanted to share with you.
translation.zh: 那些是他想和你分享的话

translation.en: His last words.
Connor took his own life.
[whispers] He what?
This is all we found with him.
translation.zh: 这是我们从他身上找到的唯一东西

translation.en: He had it folded up in his pocket.

translation.en: [Cynthia] "The Connor Project"?
Yeah, so it's a student group dedicated to keeping Connor's memory alive.
translation.zh: 是的 一个专门纪念康纳的 学生团体

translation.en: Making sure people that need help have somewhere they can go.
translation.zh: 他们会确保 需要帮助的人有地方可去

translation.en: I didn't realize Connor meant this much to people.
translation.zh: 康纳对人们居然这么重要

translation.en: Well, I mean, it was all Alana's idea. She thought of the whole thing.

translation.en: That's the young woman who organized the memorial tomorrow.
translation.zh: 是组织明天追悼会的那个女生

translation.en: -Well, she seems like… quite a force. -[Evan] Yeah, um…
Anyways…
we just wanted to do something.
It's-- It's really cool.
There's something I wanna show you. Sure.
-[door opens] -[Cynthia] Here we go.
It's a bit of a mess, I know.
We still haven't decided what to do with everything.
translation.zh: 我们还没决定好如何处理这些东西

translation.en: He used to write songs. Or at least he told us he did.
translation.zh: 他写过歌 至少他是这么跟我们说的

translation.en: He refused to play for us, so, who knows?
translation.zh: 他不愿意给我们唱 所以谁知道呢？

translation.en: He never played any for you?
No, he didn't.
No. I'm sorry.
Here it is.
It's a… [chuckles]
When Connor entered seventh grade,
all of my girlfriends said, "Here it comes, bar mitzvah season.
translation.zh: 我所有的女性朋友都说 “成人礼季节到来了

translation.en: He's going to have a different party every Saturday."
translation.zh: 他每周六都会参加不同的派对”

translation.en: And Larry was so excited to take him shopping.
translation.zh: 拉里兴奋地带着他去购物

translation.en: He dragged him to Brooks Brothers,
translation.zh: 他带他去布鲁克斯兄弟商店

translation.en: and they picked out a suit, some shirts and this tie.
translation.zh: 他带他去布鲁克斯兄弟商店 挑选了西服、衬衫 还有这条领带

translation.en: He looked just like his dad.
translation.zh: 他看起来就和他爸爸一个样

translation.en: He never got invited to a single party.
translation.zh: 但没有一个派对邀请他去

translation.en: He was such a sweet boy underneath it all.
translation.zh: 他其实是个很可爱的男孩子

translation.en: Everything just hurt too much.
I thought that you could wear this to the memorial. For your speech.
translation.zh: 我觉得你可以 打这条领带去参加追悼会 去发言

translation.en: I'm not-- I've-- I--
I wasn't-- I'm not speaking.
-Why not? -Well, I--
I just don't think, um…
I mean, most people think that I'm… not that cool of a person.
translation.zh: 我是说 大部分人都认为我… 不是那种风云人物

translation.en: So nobody wants to hear from me.
Well, if that's what most people think…
translation.zh: 如果大部分人都这么想…

translation.en: it sounds like most people don't know you very well.
translation.zh: 似乎是大部分人都不太了解你

translation.en: They didn't know Connor either. They never bothered.
translation.zh: 他们也不了解康纳 他们懒得了解

translation.en: You can tell them what they missed.
translation.zh: 你可以说说他们都错过了什么

translation.en: You're so handsome.
[whispering] I'm so glad you changed your mind.
translation.zh: 我真高兴你改变了主意

translation.en: Today is a day of remembrance and reflection.
translation.zh: 今天是值得纪念和深思的一天

translation.en: It sucks he isn't here to see this.
translation.zh: 他不能看到这一切 真是太可惜了

translation.en: The first person we'll hear from this morning is Evan Hansen.
translation.zh: 今天上午第一位发言的是 埃文汉森

translation.en: -Good morning, s-- -[mic feedback shrieking]
Sorry. [clears throat] Sorry.
Good morning, students and faculty.
I would like to say a few words to you today…
translation.zh: 我今天想对你们说一些…

translation.en: about my friend…
my best friend, Connor Murphy.
translation.zh: 我最好的朋友 康纳墨菲

translation.en: Holy shit.
I would like to tell you about the day that Connor and I went hiking
translation.zh: 我想跟你们说说康纳和我

translation.en: behind the old Autumn Smile Apple Orchard.
translation.zh: 去秋天微笑苹果园远足那天的事

translation.en: We found a huge oak tree.
translation.zh: 我们发现了一棵庞大的橡树

translation.en: Connor said he wondered what the world would look like from all the way up there,
translation.zh: 康纳说他很好奇 从上面看世界会是什么样

translation.en: so we decided to find out.
translation.zh: 所以我们决定去看一看

translation.en: We started climbing slowly,
and then when I finally looked back, we were already 30 feet off the ground.
translation.zh: 后来 我回头看时 我们已经距离地面九米了

translation.en: Connor just looked at me…
and smiled that way he always did.
Um. And then…
Sorry. Then I fell.
translation.zh: 抱歉 然后我就摔下来了

translation.en: I lay there on the ground, and--
Good morning, students and… faculty.
Sorry, that…
Sorry, that's the wrong--
♪ Have you ever felt like Nobody was there? ♪
translation.zh: 你是否曾感觉无人陪伴？

translation.en: ♪ Have you ever felt forgotten In the middle of nowhere? ♪

translation.en: ♪ Have you ever felt like You could disappear? ♪

translation.en: ♪ Like you could fall And no one would hear? ♪

translation.en: But, see, the thing is, when I looked up, Connor was there.
translation.zh: 但事实是 我抬起头时看到了康纳

translation.en: That's the gift he gave me.
To show me that I wasn't alone. Nobody is.
translation.zh: 告诉我 我并不孤单 每个人都不孤单

translation.en: That's the gift that he gave all of us.

translation.en: I just wish…
I wish we could've given that to him.

translation.en: So…

Hey. What's wrong?
Everything you said in your speech.
Everything you've done.
You don't know how much you've given all of us.
translation.zh: 你不知道… 你带给了我们多少东西

translation.en: My family. Me.
No.
No, I…
You've given me my brother back.
[Alana] Welcome to the first official meeting of the Connor Project.
translation.zh: 欢迎参加康纳计划的第一次正式会议

translation.en: Right?
Now, as you all know from Evan's speech,
translation.zh: 通过埃文的演讲 你们都知道了

translation.en: Connor's favorite place in the entire world
was the Autumn Smile Apple Orchard.
I am beyond excited to announce that in addition to our support groups,
translation.zh: 我非常激动地宣布 除了我们的后援团

translation.en: we will be launching a Kickstarter campaign
translation.zh: 我们还将在众筹网上发起一项活动

translation.en: to raise $100,000 to reopen and redesign Autumn Smile
translation.zh: 募集十万美元重新开放 并设计秋天的微笑苹果园

translation.en: as the Connor Murphy Memorial Orchard.
translation.zh: 让它成为康纳墨菲的纪念果园

translation.en: So to explain what we're going to be asking of you,
translation.zh: 所以为了说明我们对你们的请求

translation.en: I'm gonna turn things over to our director of global communications.
translation.zh: 我邀请全球沟通总监上台

translation.en: Thanks, Alana. So great.
translation.zh: 谢谢 阿兰娜 真的太棒了

translation.en: Our new website is now live.
If you have not yet read the emails between Evan and Connor…

translation.en: oh, you're gonna wanna grab some tissues.
translation.zh: 那你们得准备好纸巾了

translation.en: I swear I've got a Cal Ripken here somewhere. Look at that. Hmm?
translation.zh: 我发誓 这是卡尔瑞普金签名的棒球 瞧瞧

translation.en: The entire '96 team. There's three Hall of Famers on there.
translation.zh: 1996年的整个球队 上面有三个名人堂球员的签名

translation.en: -Wow. -You get the right people,

translation.en: baseball fans, you could raise at least a few hundred bucks for the orchard,

translation.en: maybe a couple thousand.
Yeah, but…
I mean, you should probably keep all this stuff.
It's just gonna sit here gathering dust.
Stiff as a board, isn't it?
-Yeah. -Well, it's never been used.
translation.zh: -很坚硬 对吧？-是的 就没用过

translation.en: Connor, he loved baseball… when he was little.
translation.zh: 康纳… 他超喜欢棒球 在他小时候

translation.en: The first time I met him…
Cynthia wasn't sure how the kids would react.
translation.zh: 辛西娅不知道孩子会如何反应

translation.en: She was terrified. And I was terrified.
translation.zh: 她很害怕 我也很害怕

translation.en: I mean, five minutes in…
Connor's, like, pulling my arm…
translation.zh: 康纳… 拽着我的胳膊

translation.en: "Come on. Let's go play catch."
He…
I bought that, I don't know, two years ago.
translation.zh: 我大概是两年前买的它

translation.en: I thought, you know, maybe we could…
So stupid.
He was really lucky to have a step--
To have a dad like you.
Your dad must feel pretty lucky to…
translation.zh: 你爸爸一定也觉得很幸运…

translation.en: have a son like you.
Yeah, he does.
You know, I saw the strangest thing on Facebook yesterday.
translation.zh: 我昨天在脸书上看到一件很奇怪的事情 （佐伊：你来过以后拉里心情大好）

translation.en: -Really? -Um, somebody had a video
translation.zh: 是吗？ 有人拍了你发言的视频

translation.en: of you doing a speech.
translation.zh: 有人拍了你发言的视频

translation.en: About that boy. Connor Murphy.
translation.zh: 关于那个男孩 康纳墨菲

translation.en: How the two of you climbed a tree together. At an orchard.
translation.zh: 说你们是如何一起在果园里爬树的

translation.en: You told me that you didn't know him,
translation.zh: 你跟我说过你不认识他

translation.en: but in the speech you said that he was your best friend.
translation.zh: 但是你在发言中说 他是你最好的朋友

translation.en: Right, well… 'Cause it wasn't true, um…
translation.zh: 是的 那个… 因为那不是真的…

translation.en: when I said I didn't know him.
I thought that you broke your arm at work.
translation.zh: 我以为你是在工作时摔断的胳膊

translation.en: Okay, well, who do you think drove me to urgent care?
translation.zh: 你以为是谁开车送我去急救中心

translation.en: And waited there with me? You were at work. You remember?
translation.zh: 又在那里陪我的？ 你在上班 你记得吗？

translation.en: I couldn't even-- You didn't answer your phone.
You told me that your boss took you.
translation.zh: 你跟我说是你老板带你去的

translation.en: Well, so I lied, obviously.
So when were you planning on telling me any of this?
translation.zh: 那你准备什么时候跟我说这件事？

translation.en: -When would I tell you? When are you here? -I'm here now.
translation.zh: 我什么时候跟你说？你在的时候？ 我现在就在

translation.en: Okay.
I talked to Dr. Sherman, and he told me you've been skipping appointments.
translation.zh: 我跟希尔曼医生谈过了 他告诉我 你在逃避见他

translation.en: -I missed one. -You know, those aren't free.
translation.zh: -我只有一次没去-咨询不是免费的

translation.en: Sorry. I'm sorry.
I'm…
I'm so happy you had a friend, sweetheart.
translation.zh: 你有朋友我非常高兴 亲爱的

translation.en: I'm sorry he's gone. I just wish I'd known.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉他不在了 我只是希望自己早就知道

translation.en: That speech you gave, it…
translation.zh: 你的那个发言 那个…

translation.en: I don't even know what to say. I'm…
translation.zh: 我不知道该说什么 我…

translation.en: I'm proud of you.
Thanks.
Hi.
This is a cool surprise.
Can I get you anything? Or…
Just water.
-Just water? You sure? -Yeah. That's perfect.
translation.zh: 只要水？你确定？ 确定 水就够了

translation.en: Coming up.
Where's your mom?
She works late on Fridays.
translation.zh: 她每周五都工作到很晚

translation.en: -I wanted to meet her. -Yeah, that would've been great.
translation.zh: -我本来想见见她的-那样就太好了

translation.en: What's this?
Oh. It's just-- My mom is obsessed with these college scholarship essay contests.
translation.zh: 我妈妈对那种提供大学奖学金的论文比赛很着迷

translation.en: I mean, I'd have to win probably, like, all of them
to actually pay for college, so…
translation.zh: 来支付大学学费 所以…

translation.en: Your parents, they can't…
translation.zh: 你父母 他们没能力…

translation.en: Uh, not really.
I'm sorry.
Is your room upstairs?
Yeah. It's, um…
Yeah.
Yeah. So it's a pretty standard sort of room, I guess.
translation.zh: 这是个非常普通的房间 所以…

translation.en: So… hey! Oh, um…
translation.zh: 这是个非常普通的房间 所以… 嘿

translation.en: Actually, I meant to tell you this before.
translation.zh: 其实我之前就想告诉你的

translation.en: So Alana and I had a really good--
translation.zh: 阿兰娜和我开了个不错的…

translation.en: Um, we had a really good meeting this morning, and I think--
translation.zh: 我们今早的会开得很好 你应该注意到了…

translation.en: You probably noticed that, you know,
translation.zh: 你应该注意到了… 第一周就有很多人在捐款

translation.en: a lot of people were giving during that first week,
translation.zh: 第一周就有很多人在捐款

translation.en: which is definitely great, but it sort of slowed down a bit, obviously.
translation.zh: 这当然非常好 但很显然捐款速度有点慢了

translation.en: But Alana and I are confident that it's gonna pick right back up.
translation.zh: 但阿拉娜很有信心把速度提上去

translation.en: I think it's just a matter of…
Can I talk to you about something?
Yes.
The Connor Project is awesome. It's really, really cool.
translation.zh: 康纳计划非常好 真的非常棒

translation.en: Thank you.
It's just that my whole life, everything has been about him.
translation.zh: -谢谢-只是我这一辈子 一切都和他有关

translation.en: And maybe the two of us…
Maybe we don't have to talk about my brother all the time.
translation.zh: 或许我们不用一直聊我哥哥的事

translation.en: Maybe we can…
talk about other things.
I like you.
And it's not because you were friends with my brother,
translation.zh: 不是因为你是我哥哥的朋友

translation.en: or because of the Connor Project.
I like you 'cause…
you.

translation.zh: 我不需要你说明我需要你的理由

♪ And it's only us ♪
No.
[Cynthia] I've been told that many times.
Hi, honey.
[Cynthia] Join us. I just put dinner in the oven.
translation.zh: 快来 我刚把晚饭放进烤箱里

translation.en: Hi.
She made me swear to keep it a surprise.
translation.zh: 她让我发誓给你一个惊喜的

translation.en: I'm surprised.
Hi. It's so nice to finally meet you.
translation.zh: -嗨 真高兴终于见到你了-嗨

translation.en: -Hi. -Oh, hi. Yeah… great. It's great.
translation.zh: -嗨 真高兴终于见到你了-嗨 太好了 真好

translation.en: Come on, Evan. Sit.
I thought that you were working tonight.
Cynthia called and invited me for dinner, so, you know, I'm playing hooky.
translation.zh: 辛西娅打电话请我来吃晚饭 所以我翘班了

translation.en: We were just discussing how sneaky you and Connor were.
translation.zh: 我们在说你和康纳真会隐瞒

translation.en: [Heid] I had no idea they were even friends.
translation.zh: 我都不知道他和康纳是朋友

translation.en: [Larry] We were the same. [Cynthia] Boys love their secrets.
translation.zh: -我们也是-男孩们喜欢有秘密

translation.en: Something smells good. What's for dinner?
translation.zh: 真好闻 晚饭吃什么？

translation.en: It's chicken Milanese. Your favorite.
translation.zh: 米兰煎鸡排 你的最爱

translation.en: Actually his favorite
-is my great-grandmother's black beans. -Really?
translation.zh: 是我曾祖母的豆豉 是吗？

translation.en: Well, he's the only one that appreciates my cooking, so…
translation.zh: 他是唯一欣赏我厨艺的人

translation.en: That's not true.
-Another drop? -No, no. I'm fine. Thank you.
translation.zh: 不了 不用了 谢谢

translation.en: Fascinating story about the wine.
It's from a vineyard in Napa,
translation.zh: 它产自纳帕谷的葡萄园

translation.en: and the entire growing process from start to finish, 100% sustainable.
translation.zh: 整个生长过程完全是绿色可持续的

translation.en: Is that right? Not to mention, it tastes good too.
translation.zh: -是吗？-更别提它的味道也很好

translation.en: It does.
You know, I-- I didn't realize,
Cynthia and Larry were telling me that you spend so much time here.
translation.zh: 辛西娅和拉里跟我说 你经常来这里

translation.en: Yeah. You've been working a lot, so…
Why did I think you were at Jared's?
translation.zh: 我怎么会以为你在杰瑞德家？

translation.en: I-- I don't know.
Evan was showing me all of those scholarship contests that you found.
translation.zh: 埃文给我看了 你找到的那些奖学金比赛

translation.en: It's really impressive.
Well, Evan is a great writer.
translation.zh: 埃文的写作能力很厉害

translation.en: Well, that does not surprise me at all.
His English teacher last year told me
translation.zh: 他的英语老师去年跟我说

translation.en: that he wrote one of the best papers she'd ever read on Sulu.
translation.zh: 他写的一篇论文 是她在《苏鲁》上看过最好的

translation.en: Is that right?
-It's Sula. -What?
translation.zh: -是吗？-是《苏拉》 -什么？-你刚说“苏鲁” 其实是“苏拉”

translation.en: You said "Sulu." It's Sula.
translation.zh: -什么？-你刚说“苏鲁” 其实是“苏拉”

translation.en: Yeah, I believe Sulu's a character on Star Trek.
translation.zh: 苏鲁应该是《星际迷航》里的一个角色

translation.en: My mistake.
So, speaking of scholarships…
Oh, right, uh… Yeah, well, I guess now's as good a time as any.
translation.zh: 对了 我想现在正是时候

translation.en: Cynthia, do you wanna…
Well, um…
Zoe happened to mention that Evan was having some difficulty
in terms of the financial burden of college.
translation.zh: 埃文有上大学的经济负担

translation.en: And Larry and I started thinking,
and we've been fortunate enough to set some money aside for Connor.
translation.zh: 我们很幸运地给康纳留了一些钱

translation.en: -I'm good. I'm okay. -Yeah.
Heidi, with your blessing, we would like to give Evan
translation.zh: 我们真诚地想把留给康纳的钱赠送给埃文

translation.en: the money that we set aside for our son so he can fulfill his dreams.
translation.zh: 这样他就能去实现自己的梦想了

translation.en: Thank you so much… but we're gonna be fine.
translation.zh: 非常感谢 但我们能想出办法的

translation.en: I don't have a lot of money, but I do have some.
translation.zh: 我的钱不多 但还是有一些的

translation.en: Oh. No, no. I didn't mean to in--
No, no, I understand. But we do have money,
translation.zh: 不用说了 我明白 我们确实有钱

translation.en: so I'm sorry you were under the impression that we didn't.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉让你们以为我们没钱

translation.en: And whatever money we don't have,
Evan will either make up for with a job, or he'll get a scholarship.
translation.zh: 埃文都会通过 找工作或拿奖学金来补贴

translation.en: I don't want my son to get the idea
that it's okay to rely on other people for favors.
translation.zh: 有依赖别人帮助的想法

translation.en: -Well, it's not a favor. -No.
But as his mother, I need to set that example.
translation.zh: 但是作为他妈妈 我要做好榜样

translation.en: You can't expect things from strangers.
[chuckles] We're not strangers.
No, of course not.
But you're not family either.
[Evan] Mom, just hold on.
No, I think I better get to work, see if I can grab a shift
translation.zh: 不 我想我该去工作了 既然你担心我们的经济状况

translation.en: now that I know how concerned you are about our finances.
translation.zh: 既然你担心我们的经济状况 我就去看看还能否轮班

translation.en: -Mom, will you please come back inside? -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -妈妈 拜托你回去好吗？-我的天啊 你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: -Are you kidding me? -Will you just come back inside, please?
translation.zh: -妈妈 拜托你回去好吗？-我的天啊 你在开玩笑吗？ 你能回去吗 拜托？

translation.en: They think you're their son, these people.
translation.zh: 那些人觉得你是他们的儿子

translation.en: -They're not "these people." -They don't really know you.
translation.zh: 他们不是“那些人” 他们都不了解你

translation.en: Well, they like me. I know that's very hard for you to believe.
translation.zh: 他们跟我很像 我知道这很难相信 但他们不觉得

translation.en: That they don't think I'm--
translation.zh: 我知道这很难相信 但他们不觉得

translation.en: There's something wrong with me. I need to be fixed, like you do.
translation.zh: 我有问题 并且像你一样让我去改正

translation.en: When have I ever said that?
Oh, my God. Mom, I have to go to therapy, right? I have to take drugs.
translation.zh: 我的天啊 我得去治疗 对吗？ 我得吃药 我得…

translation.en: There's nothing wrong with that. There's nothing wrong with needing help.
translation.zh: -那没有什么错 需要帮助没什么错-别说了

translation.en: Just stop. I know there is and I'm a burden.
I'm the worst thing that ever happened to you,
translation.zh: 我是你遇到的最大的厄运

translation.en: and I just ruined your life, okay?
No. You are the best thing.
translation.zh: 不是 你是最大的福气

translation.en: You're the best thing that's ever happened to me.
I'm sorry I can't give you more than that.
translation.zh: 很抱歉我给不了你更多东西

translation.en: It's not my fault if other people can.
translation.zh: 如果别人能给 那不是我的错

translation.en: I'll see you at home.
Hi. I'm so sorry. I meant to be there yesterday.
translation.zh: 嗨 很抱歉 我昨天本来是要去的

translation.en: Okay, well, we have two days left, and we're $25,000 short.
translation.zh: 我们只剩两天了 还差25000美元

translation.en: Yeah, I just-- Everything--
translation.zh: 我知道 我只是…一切…

translation.en: You're right. I know. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 你说得对 我知道 对不起

translation.en: Things have been really busy, so…
I've been wondering something.
Were you ever actually friends with him?
What are you talking about?
Well, the thing about the emails, it's just that, like,
you and Connor keep talking about climbing this tree together in June.
translation.zh: 六月份你和康纳一起去爬树的事

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -We were in school in June.
translation.zh: 我们六月份时还在上学

translation.en: You didn't have a cast until September.
translation.zh: 你是九月份才打的石膏

translation.en: You know what? We probably wrote down the wrong date or something.
It's not just the emails, Evan.
translation.zh: 不仅仅是邮件 埃文

translation.en: You've missed, like, three meetings in a row.
translation.zh: 你连着错过了三次会议

translation.en: If I were his best friend, I would be doing everything I could
translation.zh: 如果我是他最好的朋友 我会尽我所能

translation.en: to make sure his dream of rebuilding the orchard came true.
translation.zh: 帮他实现重建果园的梦想

translation.en: It's terrible people aren't giving as much money as we hoped.
translation.zh: 大家捐的钱 没达到我们的预期是很糟

translation.en: It is, but it's not like it's him. You know what I mean?
translation.zh: 但也没必要把果园看得像他那么重

translation.en: It's just-- It's an orchard, Alana.
translation.zh: 你懂我的意思吗？ 那只是个果园 阿兰娜

translation.en: We have people watching us, hoping…
translation.zh: 大家都在看着我们… 期待着…

translation.en: praying that we can prove Connor wrong.
translation.zh: 祈祷我们可以证明康纳是错的

translation.en: And if the orchard is just an empty promise,
translation.zh: 如果果园的事没有兑现

translation.en: all of those people will know that Connor was right…
translation.zh: 所有人都会知道康纳是对的

translation.en: that no one cares.
Did you lie to me?
Did I lie to all these people?
Just go to your email.
-Another email? -It's not…
It's not another email.
"Dear Evan Hansen."
If we weren't friends, then he wouldn't…
translation.zh: 如果我们不是朋友 他就不会…

translation.en: He wouldn't have written his note to me.
translation.zh: 他就不会给我写这封遗书

translation.en: Look, only his family have seen this, okay?
translation.zh: 听着 只有他的家人看过这个 好吗？

translation.en: You can't show it to anybody else, okay?
translation.zh: 你不能…你不能让别人看 好吗？

translation.en: Alana. Okay.
He wasn't right.
You know that, don't you?

translation.zh: 需要借此契机去提醒他们

♪ Isn't that all we're ever Really looking for? ♪

translation.en: ♪ Anonymous anymore ♪
Can you imagine?
Wh... What's wrong?
-Hi. -Alana, you have to take it down, okay?
translation.zh: -嗨-阿兰娜 你必须把它删掉

translation.en: -They've been through enough. -I took it down already, Evan,
translation.zh: 他们已经受了太多罪 我已经删除了 埃文

translation.en: but it doesn't matter because it's everywhere.
translation.zh: 可没用了 现在已经传开了

translation.en: Zoe, it's me. Please call me back, okay? I'm worried about you.
translation.zh: 佐伊 是我 请给我回电话 我很担心你

translation.en: -They have pictures of us now. -Just put it away.
translation.zh: 他们放了我们照片在网上 别看了

translation.en: "His parents act like they are bereft,
translation.zh: “他的父母一副痛失爱子的模样

translation.en: but where were they when their son was actually alive?"
translation.zh: 但他们的儿子活着的时候 他们在哪里？”

translation.en: Please stop reading them.
-Hey. Is Zoe here? -She went home.
translation.zh: -嘿 佐伊在这里吗？-她回家了

translation.en: Things really aren't good here. I know. I just-- I had to come.
translation.zh: -情况很不好-我知道 我必须过来

translation.en: [Larry] I don't know.
translation.zh: -他们怎么会有康纳的遗书？-我不知道

translation.en: [Cynthia] Did they hack our computers? They hacked our emails?
translation.zh: 他们黑了我们的电脑吗？ 他们黑了我们的邮件？

translation.en: These people are adults. Did you see their pictures?
translation.zh: 这些人是成年人 你看到他们的照片了吗？

translation.en: -[cell phone ringing] -[Larry] Maybe let it ring.
translation.zh: 这些人是成年人 就让电话响着吧

translation.en: [Zoe] Hello?
translation.zh: 我不想再躲着了 喂？好 祝你继续悲惨下去

translation.en: Yeah, have fun with your miserable life.
translation.zh: 喂？好 祝你继续悲惨下去

translation.en: -What's the number? -It's blocked.
translation.zh: -他们说了什么？号码是什么？-被屏蔽了 这…

translation.en: -Did they threaten you? -No. Doesn't matter.
translation.zh: -他们说了什么？号码是什么？-被屏蔽了 这… 我要报警

translation.en: [Cynthia] I'm calling the police.
[Larry] Maybe the best thing to do is to just stay calm, all right?
translation.zh: 现在也许最好的办法 就是冷静 好吗？

translation.en: [Cynthia] That's always your solution. Wait and see.
translation.zh: 你一直都是这么解决问题的对吧？等等看

translation.en: [Larry] What are the police going to do?
translation.zh: 警察能怎么办？这是网络

translation.en: It's the Internet. Are they gonna arrest the Internet?
[Cynthia] I had to beg you, every step of the way, for therapy, for rehab.
translation.zh: 我什么事都得求着你 -治疗是 戒毒所也是-不是

translation.en: [Larry] What? No, no.
translation.zh: -治疗是 戒毒所也是-不是

translation.en: You went lurching from one miracle cure to the next.
[Cynthia] Really? Because all he needed was another $20,000 weekend yoga retreat.
translation.zh: -你认真的吗？-你只要再花两万美元去做周末瑜伽

translation.en: What was your alternative?
translation.zh: 除了批评我做到的每件事

translation.en: Other than picking apart everything that I did?
translation.zh: 除了批评我做到的每件事 -你还有别的选择吗？-为什么不让他

translation.en: How about putting him on one program and sticking to it?
translation.zh: -你还有别的选择吗？-为什么不让他 做一件事并坚持下去？

translation.en: Remember what he said the first time that Connor tried to kill himself?
translation.zh: 记得康纳第一次 想自杀时说了什么吗？

translation.en: -"He's just looking for attention." -For Christ's sake.
translation.zh: 他在寻求关注 他需要的是关注

translation.en: I'm not gonna sit here and defend myself!
translation.zh: 我不要坐在这里为自己辩护

translation.en: You never understood him because he wasn't yours.
translation.zh: 你不理解他 你从没了解过他 因为他不是你亲生的

translation.en: Mom, what the hell?
I raised him from the time he was three.
translation.zh: 我从他三岁时就开始抚养他

translation.en: He was getting better and you refused to see it. Ask Evan.
translation.zh: 他在变好 而你却视而不见 问问埃文

translation.en: Tell them, Evan.
Evan did everything that he could.
translation.zh: 埃文做了他能做的一切

translation.en: Evan? Evan was in denial of what was happening.
translation.zh: 埃文否认了所发生的一切

translation.en: [Zoe] Do not bring him into this.
[Cynthia] Read the note, Larry. Read what he said.
translation.zh: 看看遗书 拉里 看看他说的话

translation.en: "I just wish that everything was different."
-I tried. But he was my son! -[Cynthia] He wanted...
translation.zh: -我努力了 他是我儿子-他想要…

translation.en: -[Zoe] Please. -I tried everything!
translation.zh: -我努力了 他是我儿子-他想要… 我努力了

translation.en: Stop it! Just please stop! Please stop fighting.
translation.zh: 别说了 拜托别说了 -拜托别吵了-他在努力变好

translation.en: He was trying to be better. He was trying!
And he was failing.
We failed him.
No, you didn't. No, you didn't. You didn't fail him.
translation.zh: 你们没有 你们没有让他失望

translation.en: Read the note.
He didn't write it.
I wrote it.
You didn't write Connor's suicide note.
translation.zh: 康纳的遗书不可能是你写的

translation.en: It was an assignment from my therapist. Write a letter to yourself. A pep talk.
translation.zh: 那是我的心理医生布置的任务 给自己写封信 给自己打气

translation.en: "Dear Evan Hansen, Today's going to be a good day.
translation.zh: “致埃文汉森 今天会是美好的一天 原因如下”

translation.en: -Here's why." -I don't think--
I was supposed to bring it to my appointment with me,
translation.zh: 我本来是要带着它去找医生的但是康纳拿走了

translation.en: but Connor took it, and then I guess he must've had it with him…
translation.zh: 我想你们发现他的时候…

translation.en: when you found him, so…
translation.zh: 他肯定一直放在身上 所以…

translation.en: What are you saying?
We weren't friends.
No. No, no, no.
♪ I never meant to make it Such a mess ♪
translation.zh: 我从来都不想把事情弄得这么糟

translation.en: ♪ I never thought that It would go this far ♪
translation.zh: 我没想到事情会发展到这个地步

translation.en: There were emails. You showed us emails.
translation.zh: 有邮件 你给我们看过的

translation.en: ♪ So I just stand here sorry Searching for something to say ♪
translation.zh: 所以我只能抱歉地站在这里 想想该说什么

translation.en: ♪ Something to say ♪
